fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents

Class AUltraActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents.AUltraActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, KeyEvent.Callback, LayoutInflater.Factory, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Window.Callback, IUltraActivityFragmentActionListener, IUltraActivity, IManagerEventClient

    public abstract class AUltraActivity
extends FragmentActivity
implements DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, IUltraActivityFragmentActionListener, IUltraActivity, IManagerEventClient
    Abstract class for FragmentActivity class. Constains all needed tools like Toasts, Loading Dialogs Automatically registers to ManagerEvent class
    Author:
    Klawikowski
